alert.note: Alert for Clark; Nevada; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 9:07AM CST until February 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Little Missouri River Near Boughton affecting Nevada, Clark and Ouachita Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Missouri River Near Boughton. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Pastures along the river begins to flood. Water backing up half moon slough and boggy creek in Southwest Clark county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Thursday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 21.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Little Missouri Boughton 20.0 16.0 Thu 8 AM 19.6 14.8 10.5 21.0 12 AM 2/10 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
